description.@en: Unfortunately, your cynicism is difficult to hide, the scars upon your psyche visible to all. This carries through both in your personal and professional life, triggering during instances of intense stress or pain. This sickness may send you into a blinding rage or cause you to cower in the corner like a squalling babe.

effect.@en: When you fail Willpower-based Skill Tests, they are treated as if they were Critical Failures instead.
